name: Chicken Shoot: 3D Sniping Game
description:
Chicken shoot is inspired by other animal hunting game. We want to see happiness on the faces of our users.
Minimal Game play includes 4 Different Levels
1.Classic Mode
2.Survival Mode
3.Arcade Mode
4.Stage Mode
You can enjoy any Level you want to Enjoy.
You can Buy different guns to shoot those running chicken and make meal tonight.
You have to
1.Shoot the Chicks with Multiple guns
2.Switch the Guns by Earning Cash
3.Tough Challenges are ahead and you must have strong Shooting and Aiming Skills to reach the Higher Levels.
4.Shoot on Running Chicks with Precision and Gain points.
5.Enjoy the Chick and Scream out tonight with CHICKEN SHOOT.
